translations: 微不足道的；寒酸的；肮脏的

sentences.sentence: Most of his songs are pretty crummy.
sentences.translation: 他的歌曲大多糟糕透顶。

sentences.sentence: When I first came here, I had a crummy apartment.
sentences.translation: 我刚来这儿时，曾住在一个糟糕的公寓里。

sentences.sentence: The day of my appointment, I was feeling crummy.
